mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNO , C.* , M.NICKNAME FROM ( SELECT NO , WRITER , ARTICLE_NO , CONTENT , WDATE FROM YOMUL_COMMENTS WHERE WRITER = #{no} ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(NO, 2, 10)) DESC) C ) C JOIN ( SELECT NO , NICKNAME FROM YOMUL_MEMBERS ) M ON C.WRITER = M.NO ) WHERE RNO > 10 * (#{page} - 1) AND RNO <= 10 * #{page}

select no, writer, content, wdate, likes, img from (select rownum as rno, no, writer, content, wdate, likes, img from (select c.no, m.nickname as writer, c.content, c.wdate, c.likes, c.img from v_y_comments c, yomul_members m where c.article_no = #{no} and c.writer = m.no order by c.wdate desc) where rownum <= #{perPage} * #{page}) where rno > #{perPage} * (#{page} - 1)
select count(*) from yomul_comments where article_no = #{no} group by article_no
mapper.insert: insert into yomul_comments(no, article_no, writer, content, wdate) values('C'||yomul_comments_no_seq.nextval, #{articleNo}, #{writer}, #{content}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select no from(select no from v_y_comments where article_no = #{articleNo} and writer = #{writer} order by no desc) where rownum = 1
